name: Search Offenes Parlement for MdB
description:
Searches the API of http://offenesparlament.de/ for informations to a member of the german parliament. See http://offenesparlament.de/info/daten for more options on this API. 

the forename-lastname-party must be specified as a node (f.e. wolfgang-bosbach-cducsu). To get JSON-Data from the API, set the URL-Suffix to .json. The "id"-key of the raw-data may be used as an object-id
